articles.description: Raphael Varane heads a late winner against Wolverhampton Wanderers as Manchester United make a winning start to the new Premier League season.
articles.title: Varane heads late winner for Man Utd against Wolves

articles.description: Chelsea complete the signing of Brighton midfielder Moises Caicedo for £100m which could rise to a British record fee of £115m.
articles.title: Chelsea sign Brighton's Caicedo for initial £100m

articles.description: Tammy Beaumont becomes the first women's batter to hit a century in The Hundred with a spectacular 118 for Welsh Fire against Trent Rockets.
articles.title: Beaumont hits first women's century in The Hundred

articles.description: Five things to look out for as Sweden, Spain, Australia and England prepare for their Women's World Cup semi-finals.
articles.title: Five talking points before World Cup semi-finals

articles.description: Watch the plays of the day from The Hundred including a record-breaking score from Welsh Fire batter Tammy Beaumont and a ramp six from Joe Root of the Trent Rockets.
articles.title: Beaumont creates Hundred history - plays of the day

articles.description: Wolves boss Gary O'Neil says elite referees manager Jon Moss told him he "could not believe" his side were not given a late penalty in the 1-0 defeat at Manchester United.
articles.title: Referees chief couldn't believe penalty not given - O'Neil

articles.description: American veteran Venus Williams beats a top-20 player for the first time since 2019 with victory over Veronika Kudermetova in the Cincinnati Open first round.
articles.title: Venus Williams, 43, earns biggest win in four years

articles.description: BBC Sport looks at what has prompted Chelsea to pay such a vast fee for the 21-year-old and where he will fit in to Mauricio Pochettino's side this season.
articles.title: Why Chelsea are spending up to £115m on Caicedo

articles.description: Which players impressed our football pundit Garth Crooks enough to make his first Team of the Week this season?
articles.title: Garth Crooks' Team of the Week

articles.description: Defending champions Trent Rockets boost their hopes of making the knockouts in The Hundred men's competition with a four-run win over Welsh Fire in Cardiff.
articles.title: Holders Rockets boost knockout hopes with Fire win
